text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Elden Ring, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-52-72EV 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The fan noise is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-52-72EV 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Valorant, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-52-72EV 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The screen brightness is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-52-72EV 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-52-72EV 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!
